title._content: ["Chelmsford," Elon Huntington Hooker house,  Greenwich, Connecticut. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Chelmsford," Elon Huntington Hooker house, Greenwich, Connecticut. Brook garden] [ca. 1914] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: McKim, Mead & White, expansion of existing house, 1909-1911. Landscape: Warren Henry Manning 1909-14. Associated Name: Blanche Ferry (Mrs. Elon H.) Hooker. Today: House, but not garden extant. On lantern slide mount: handwritten note "H" and "Hooker [...]." Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16687 Call Number: LC-J717-X107- 43
